ancestors.content:
🇺🇸 Americans who had reservations set to vacation in Jasper National Park Resort and city.
🧵 1/?
All reservations are cancelled due to a massive wildfire burning in the city and park.

Please forward your complaints to the Alberta conservative Premier Danielle Smith the one who wants to increase that province's exports of the dirtiest oil on earth.

Email: https://www.alberta.ca/premier-contact.cfm

Phone: 780-427-2711 (outside Alberta)

This could be your hotel burning right now.

Please boost
#ClimateChange

account.note:
Canadian, eh

account.note:
Klimaatdrammer, Caring Consumer, lid PvdD, woont in Groningen, geboren in 1953, 2 kinderen, hou van mijn kinderen, mijn katten, mijn vriendin en mijn bonusdochters.
Muziek van Metallica, Pink Floyd, Muse. Marillion (met Fish)
Van Twitter verbannen omdat ik trofie jagers voor psychopaten uitmaakte en dat vind ik nog steeds!

descendants.content:
@Snowshadow Danielle Smith, I'm sure, is salivating, glad that it's Jasper that's being hit so hard.

Internationally-famous showpiece, national park? That means extra federal money coming in for rebuilding efforts. And I'm sure she'll take credit for the jobs it produces.

@zenheathen
I am sure you are correct.
